casebody.data:
No. 324,

Misc.

Malory v. McGettrick, Sheriff. Walter S. Haffner for petitioner. John T. Corrigan and Harvey R. Monck for respondent. Briefs of amici curiae, in support of the petition, were filed by Norman Leonard for the National Lawyers Guild, and by Melvin L. Wulf and Ralph Rudd for the American and Ohio Civil Liberties Unions. T. W. Bruton, Attorney General of North Carolina, and Ralph Moody, Deputy Attorney General, filed a brief for the State of North Carolina, as amicus curiae, in opposition.

C. A. 6th Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
